content.detailedDescription: i walked outside to take some trash to a container in my back yard, and looked up into the sky directly above me and noticed a dark, triangular object in the sky traveling completely silent from the west in a straight flight path to the east.The object was flying at a speed no less than 200 mph, and was emitting orange light from the underside of the object.I am quite familiar with all current commercial and military aircraft that is publicly known.This was certainly nothing that i could classify as a known aircraft or uav.This object looked to be flying toward the ravenna national guard armory near kent state, or more likely heading toward the lockheed martin installation.This is not the first time i have seen this aircraft and it has taken the same flight path.
content.summary: Dark triangular shaped aircraft flew overhead totally silent at a very rapid speed

content.detailedDescription: Siting took place during a childhood camping trip along the national seashore on padre island near corpus christi, tx in 1977. we were sleeping in our rv on the beach and i woke up because i was hot. when i went to open the roof vent more, i remember seeing this large triangular-shaped craft silently moving in a ne direction over our rv. i distinctly remember seeing an exhaust plume that was multi-colored and lights on each of the three corners. i believe one was orange and the other two corners had blue-white colored lights.
content.summary: Saw triangular shaped dark craft through roof vent of motor home at night on beach

content.detailedDescription: john and i were driving home at 10:30pm on rt 111 in pelham, nh during the first snowstorm of y2k when we saw a searchlight up ahead scanning left to right. we thought it was a medivac helicopter. then we saw another light zip across the sky and start searching in front of us. the cloud ceiling was 200 feet. then the second light disappeared and the original light came towards us . it was right over the power lines with a beam of light coming down to the telephone pole wires and passed directly over our car. it stopped when it came to the high tension wires and moved sideways down the high tension lines toward the source of the power like it was recharging its batteries. i made some models since i have seen them up close enough to count the rivets.
content.summary: Black triangle bright searchlight red / green wingtip lights football field size

content.detailedDescription: Did not see object. noticed on photo after the fact.
content.summary: Did not see.  observed in photo after the fact

content.detailedDescription: A woman told me about a ufo sighting she experienced in 2013, 2014 and 2015. she said she was having a cigarette on her porch in the late evening during the summer when a light showed up over the trees. she said it looked like a solar eclipse with a black center and a golden outline. she said she couldn't move until the ball left. it sat "staring" at her for a while before it "shot sideways" and was gone. this happened three separate times around the same time of the year. she said her son-in-law also saw it the last time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering ball

content.detailedDescription:
1. at home with friends
2. notice the strange sounds n whirring and humming after explaining to friends seems like when i did certain things, a ufo would appear, first thought it was just in my head but then they also saw n herd it
3. thought maybe like a helicopter but went outside n it definitely was not
4.Juat hovering and whiring/humming with a few nights but somewhat shrouded with clear skies, yet shrouded and oval or disk type then seemed to zoom off extremely quickly
5. utter excitement that other friends saw it yet one friend who didn't. believe in any ufo stuff didn't see it yet other friends were amazed and excited n described to me very similar what i saw aa well 
6.It zoomed up n off very quickly

now when i takena substance know as dxm electronics start acting off n very often suddenly there's black helicopters outside n dxm has diff effects at different doses known as plataeus n the 4th is known for possible contact with aliens/entities/spirits/ and other such things n that's why i thought was just me till friends started noticing odd things happening around me when on it as well so idk what to fully make of that detail
content.summary: Hovering shrouded buzzing humming whiring above house

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back garden with my dog at 11pm when i looked up into the sky at a btight looking star at high level,it started to travel across the clear sky in straight line so i moved towards my back door to watch it and after moving across half the skyline it suddenly changed direction and moved towards me lowering in height as it moved towards me.
i felt shocked and scared but i stayed in position and this object was cigar shaped about 12 foot long and 4 foot wide,it was at the height of my two storey house roof level.
it made the sound of a firework when first lit like a crackling sound,it moved slowly over the top of me then over the roof of my house and the noise from it disappeared.
i then panicked and ran into my house where my wife was in bed and i described my experience to her,she said my face looked white.
i started to get the feeling in my head that the experience was in my imagination and i felt that my brain could not accept what i had seen,but in the morning my wife told me what i had described to her the night before and  started to accept the experience and i feel lucky and happy that the universe was willing to show me that there are things out there that we don’t all experience.
content.summary: Saw star in sky then it moved across sky then flew over my head at low level

content.detailedDescription: While looking up a street address on maps application, i noticed these odd stills in the "bird's eye" view.
content.summary: Lookzs like a capture rays on a vehicle?

content.detailedDescription: I contacted your organization last year when i encountered multiple entities. i have had bigfoot encounters since i was young. i felt drawn to go to a park were my uncles had experiences when they were young. well, little and big furry humanoids were there. i contacted you last time and was embarrassed. guys i am asking for your help. i have photo evidence, and u can use it all. i a weird scar on my hand, my daughter has told me of a little white guy that had no hair and was naked and put a wand to her head. she is six guys. i have had dreams and lost time. i also have film of a ufo that looks like a star that followed me. i don't know what to do, i am asking for help. this isn't be, this is the real deal and i am asking for help.On the above account i am positive i was abducted. my daughter is so scared that i sleep in a rocking chair in her room. i am positive that my daughter and i have been abducted. we had an incident during the day and my father was there too.I could go on. i have had a five minute encounter with a grey, four foot, hairless, humanoid with big eyes in the woods. etc. i will take a lie detector test. please help my daughter and i. i need to talk with someone... i thought i could handle this, but memories are surfacing. . please. i feel sick to my stomach just talking about it. i sent another email to your abduction organization, but i am sending this because this situation is only increasing and i don't care what people think anymore! please help, my baby is having memories surface as well.
content.summary: felt drawn to go outside. i then looked up and there was a ufo taking off.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friends were walking home from a walk then something just drew us to look up so we all looked up at the same time a few seconds before the event then out of no where a green circular shape appeared the hovered for a few seconds the disappeared i am pretty sure the light of ufo went out of orbit then we ran to my house and talked to my parents about the event then me and my friends stayed outside of my house to see if anything else would happen then a loud screech came form the sky and we ran inside
content.summary: Seconds before the event the night a green light appeared and hovered for like a few seconds then went out of orbit a few minutes later a loud screech came form the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Attica, in 

just was doing measurements for my friend's roof. and was looking up counting the number of siding strips up the side of the house, when i noticed 4 lights in a v formation. even though 5 lights would make it a symmetrical v, i only observed 4: 2 on the left wing, 1 on the right, and 1 on the point.

it was 21:48 est, it was dark and there was a haze of cloud cover. the lights weren't very bright but they were definitely illuminated. it was flying nne then took a significant turn to se. these 4 lights didn't seem like they were part of one object, but looked like they did their own thing, but still flew in formation. the two lights on the left wing seem to dance around each other. while the front and right light just followed a weird path.

this sighting lasted for 5-10 seconds. i don't know what to make of it, this was just my observation. there was nothing i can think of that i would have been mistaken for.
content.summary: V shape light pattern.

content.detailedDescription: I first saw it hovering above main st silver creek then flew up over the post office and it was over the golf course it was only about 20 feet off the ground it accidentally cut a small wire over main st. it appeared to be chasing after a black car. i was scared because if i was any closer it could have cut off my head i ran. but in a few seconds i was just happy that the black helicopter wasn't even chasing me personally. i just told the few people that were around me that saw it. i think you need to get to the high ground. a few weeks later a freak rain storm came and dropped 7.2 inches of rain in 1 hour it caused the dam to break and it flooded the village. it didn't even get on the weather channel. fema came and paid off everyone affected.
content.summary: A black helicopter no tail number flew west above main st silver creek ny. 20 feet off the ground it appeared to be chasing after black car?  other people saw it too but i didn't report it.  soon after that a horse was scared to death by a black heli

content.detailedDescription: I was in my apt. living room and it was quarter till 7:00 a.M. i believe on a friday february 16.And i decided to see if i can film any stars in the front of my place. i went out with my camera and pointed up at the stars like i always do and an object which i thought was a star at first seemed to be moving as if it where to fall out of the sky so to speak. i just wonder in amazement as to what this object is. i film this type of stuff as much as i can. this time i thought was particularly odd because i was out in the open in front of venice blvd. i just want someone to take me seriously because when i tell anyone that i can see these objects they either don't believe me, say i'm lying/not telling the truth or just try to say its something else other than unidentified. the object began to dim as time elapsed. if you guys at ,ufon could help me by providing me with a more clearer explanation i would greatly appreciate it.Thank you for your time.I have over 200 files of this type of footage if anyone wants to know more please email me asap [removed email link]
content.summary: Seen a stralike object in the sky outside my apt. and filmed it.

content.detailedDescription: While working, spotted square object about half the size of a 1300 square foot house about a mile away. flying not slow, not fast. made 90 degree directional turn. couldn’t believe what i was seeing that i asked 2 old ladies in the neighborhood if they could actually see what i was seeing just to make sure i wasn’t seeing things. they looked at said they couldn’t believe it either and said they were going him to go look on the internet to see if anyone had posted anything about it. made the hairs on the back of my neck stand up.
content.summary: Square object about half the size of a 1300 square foot house. flying not slow, not fast. made 90 degree directional turn.

content.detailedDescription: At about 11pm almost midnight on a beautiful clear night, about year 2013, i saw 3 disc-shaped ufos, about 160 feet (or 50 meters) away, in the west or north-west direction, when i started walking down from about middle of pedregal hills in cabo san lucas, mexico. i realised they were ufos because they were hovering, and their flight paths were with quick directional changes (changing positions very fast, erratically, and making erratic patterns in the night sky). they were 3 bright glowing red lights, sometimes the lights were also blinking. they amazed/ perplexed me all through my 20-minute walk down the hill (pedregal hill). there was nobody around me, so i was quite scared, and i couldn't wait to ask someone what those 3 ufos were ! when i reached the guard-house of pedregal hills near the base, i asked the 3 security-guards what those 3 ufos were, as we could still see the 3 ufos there in the sky ! the security-guards said they were also observing the 3 ufos, and had never seen anything like that before ! the security-guards were also perplexed by those 3 ufos ! thereafter, i continued walking to my apartment, into the streets with taller buildings, and i stopped looking into the sky. i talked to my friends once in a while about my sightings, but they did not have the same sightings !  i decided to report this now because recently i started watching youtube videos and realised that other people have reported their sightings, and some of the videos even showed the same 3 ufos that i saw (with the same red lights, same erratic changing patterns, and same blinking lights, hovering with flight paths of quick directional changes) !
content.summary: I saw 3 ufos with red glowing and blinking lights in pedregal hills, cabo san lucas.
content.locationName: Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur

content.detailedDescription:
Observed object descent from back patio door when letting dogs outside.
white light round object clearly visable in the night sky and descent was very rapid. object faster than normal airplanes and trijectory of object was directly to surface in the distance. lighted object was constant light, not blicking like airplane.
content.summary: Light direct descent in north horizon from home location but no crash sound, possibly 5 miles away.

content.detailedDescription: At 11:54 pm i was traveling east on i 494. as i was approaching the wakota bridge i observed a bright orange object flashing different colors at moments. as i became closer to the flying object i realized it was the same flying objects i have spotted in past sightings. it was traveling east. then seemed to move south east. as i continued to travel on i 694. i observed what look to be the flying object now traveling parallel to my car  on my right traveling north. possibly about a mile east of me. as i exited off the vally creek exit. i no longer had sight of it. when i got to work. and was walking into work. i looked up and saw a bright light moving above the tree line traveling north. i had to go into the building to start work. so i could not see where it went.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange flashing different colors flying tree level over the wakota bridge

content.detailedDescription: On feb. 23, 2018 at 6 pm around dusk but still daylight my husband and i were on our back deck with binoculars looking at birds on our lake when i looked up at what i thought was an airplane. it was in the south west sky, the sun was setting, it was below the horizon.  we live in hilly terrain.  it was round like a moon and very shiny, like a mirror reflecting light. it was shiny like mercury, and the light wavered like a  mirage.  we looked at it through the binoculars and then it divided straight down the middle while in continued to hover in the same spot.  after it split the two halves remained side by side and you could see blue sky between the halves.  we viewed it for about a minute or two amazed at what we were seeing then it just vanished.  a few seconds after if vanished it reappeared a little farther south and this time it was moving south at the same speed as a jet airliner would move.  it was still divided in half as it moved, then it vanished again.  we didn't see it anymore after that.
content.summary: Spotted in sky while standing on my back deck.  was looking at birds in the lake with binoculars when we saw the ufo in the sky.  it split in half while hovering, then vanished, then reappeared while moving farther south.

content.detailedDescription: I live on the 5th floor of an apt. building which is on a high hill. i stepped outside onto my balcony around 7 p.M. and first noticed the sky was clear and blue but noticed an odd looking cloud shelf low in the horizon going left to right and i noticed a boom-arang shaped "cloud" just above the cloud shelf - i looked at it through the binoculars and it seemed to be made up of tiny horizontal dashes - not normal cloud material.  it didn't move throughout this sighting. then i began noticing pitch black "worm-like" lines - some coming up from this cloud shelf then more descending from the middle of the blue sky (it's getting dusk at this point) then i began seeing more worm-like black lines starting at the top of the cloud shelf and going up and to the left as if drawing lines in the sky. i've never seen anything like this in my life (i'm 58). then i called my sister and while i had her on the phone describing these bizarre black lines in the sky suddenly to the west what looked like a very bright star just appeared (clear sky) and it was pulsing white, red/orange and green and getting brighter then 4 more smaller orange/red pulsing lights appeared at the same time around this larger pulsing thing. then suddenly all 5 objects disappeared - went dark. they didn't move around at all while they were visible.  it's now night time - dark out and i haven't seen anything else unusual.  this is crazy. i took the pictures attached but they're hard to see - i was shaking watching these black worm things in the sky so the pictures are blurry and not all worm like things showed up.  i think the picture with the vertical red lights are from a tv tower.  you can barely make out the black worm things and i didn't capture the pulsing star-like objects - it was too dark outside at that point. i only got pictures of the boomarang cloud and black worm things.
content.summary: I was looking to the sw just above cloud line - star like thing appeared -was stationary, pulsing white, orange-red and green

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home and noticed there was a lovely sunset over atlanta so i grabbed my phone to take a picture. after snapping a couple photos i noticed there was something strange in the sky so i zoomed in. then i noticed it was moving. so i took a video to get a better idea of what it was. it was strangely bat-shaped, bigger than an airplane, dark and almost amorphous. it was moving at a weird speed, it seemed to be floating almost bobbing up and down, and it flew behind a building building.
content.summary: Stage object almost bat shaped but larger floating near building then disappeared behind it

content.detailedDescription: I was at my aunt's house and i was reading and i heard a weird sound, so i looked out side and there it was hovering over the driveway.At first i thought it was a drone, then i realized it was way to big to be a drone. it was like a smooth chrome color with white lights. i felt like i was with my grandpa again. the ship them started hovering over the house and i blue light filled the room. i started floating from my bed and i floated through the ceiling and into the ship. i then got showed around by humanoid creatures.
content.features: Dome, Window(s), Patterned Surface, Appendage(s), Wings
content.summary: Small enough to fit 10 human like creatures and a testing lab.

content.detailedDescription:
I was reading your news feed, man sees ufo land, alien looks at him,
clicked on the story and got a warning from webroot  that there was a virus there.

you need a regular contact form for this type of thing
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down a poorly lit road around 8:40pm (it was already dark)(march 15/18 abbotsford, bc)... i had another person with me at the time.
at first i didn't really pay much attention to the craft as i assumed it was an airplane in a distance. i started taking more notice as i continued driving as the air craft seemed to be quite low and what seemed to be slow moving. however, as i neared the air craft it was not moving at all it was hovering in one spot directly over the road. it was hovering in one spot probably above the power lines (distance wise)... i kept driving but i slowed down as i was driving under it (directly under it). i told my companion "that is no plane"! it was a black colour with lights (lights flashing like an airplane as that was the deception in the start)... it was loud sounding as i passed under it (loud engine). it was a long ish kind of shape in width that was about the same size as the width of the road (double lane road)... it had some kind of strips of material fluttering off it. it was not a drone. i drove under it but to be honest i was tripping out a little bit in the moment as normally i am a very skeptical person. i drove up to the next street crossing (approx city block and a half) and did a u turn as i was going to take pictures or a video etc. i sped back down the road but as i neared it again it left. it just seemed to look like just any other light in the sky within seconds. i don't know for sure what it was. when i was under it was really the only time i could hear it's engine... i couldn't hear what it sounded like when it took off as i was speeding back toward it to take some pics... all that i could really hear was my own engine speeding back towards it ... i don't know what it was, but it was not a drone or an airplane.
content.summary: Driving down road around 8:40pm and witnessed an aircraft at first thought it was a plane in the distance but as i kept driving it was no plane in the distance as it was hovering above the road i was on. i passed directly under it.

content.detailedDescription: I was pointing my phone at the sun with a dark background settings this is when i observed five different ufos approximately 4 p.M. in the sky toward the south east these objects was near to the sun when you see the sun it's black the background is black but these has luminated factors to them and they all had different designs take a close look at the pictures and the drawings and you'll see what i'm talking about now the sun is black but you can see the trails they leave behind and next to the sun you can see a planet down below.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the sun when i caught the ufos they were five with designs on them i took them with a black background for the sun

content.detailedDescription:
On 3/4/2018 while working in my shed, i heard the dog bark i stepped out the shed to see what he was barking at. as i stood there i looked into the sky i saw what looked like a plane/helicopter go strait towards this light and then disappear. i said to myself that looks weird so i grabbed my cell phone to start recording my phone was to low for video so i ran inside i got my wife's phone and ran back out side and started recording. it appear to me that something was shooting at it. i video taped it and at one point you see it flash in a big glow then move. this is the first sighting i have seen. a few nights before that i was picking something up off the floor in the shed and i looked up and i saw a white face with black eyes looking thru the shed at me. i stepped out the shed thinking it might of been one of my kids playing with me, but no one was there but i felt like someone was watching me. when i went back in the shed it felt like something kept trying to pull down my pants and seems like something pinched me and i kind of loss awareness then i came too. i felt kind of odd like something had happen i did notice some scars on my hand and back. but i just ignored it.
i also have one more video a longer version that is on my youtube site it shows the ufo glowing and flashing some kind of force field.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Looked like they where fighting in the sky. i have video

content.detailedDescription: First off we live across the street from a city park, i always see the lights from park by this particular night i had grabbed my rug from outside and looked up in the east direction and see lights hovering, we live by a small airport too but this here was no plane. after i watched the lights it slowly descended. then 2 army choppers fly by idk what to think by it’s happened 2 weeks in a row.. i believe this was a ufo and i’m freaked out
content.summary: It’s happened 2 thursday’s in a row my husband freaked out and told me to close the door he says it’s a star ummmm stars don’t blink and move w weird flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
Ok let's begin. we were visiting a friend of ours that lived in the apartments next to where the ufo encounter started for us. we visited for awhile and then our friend went to bed. at that time it was really late, way after 2am. we were both into astronomy and so we decided to sit on the ground next to the apartment(west side of building) and stargaze. we were looking at the stars and admiring the beauty of it all. and it's important to note that from our vantage point we were looking in the eastern sky. after about two hours we were looking up i noticed a white star that seemed a little unusual. it was bigger than all the rest of the stars and there was something about it that didn't seem right and it got my attention. i told my friend to look at the unusual star and so we both starred at it. the star was up about 40 to 45 degrees from the horizon. we were starring and watching this unusual white star for at least 30 minutes. as we were watching this unusually bright star, the rays of the star began to get bigger and bigger. which we both looked at each other in amazement and astonishment. the rays of what appeared to be a bright white star began to almost come directly at us or it appeared that way. as this was going on the wind began to pick up and we heard some rustling in the tall dead grass next to us. we both got a little frightened after that since the rays of the star was unusual enough. we both proceeded to get up from sitting on the ground and try and see if our friend that lived in the apartment was still awake or not. we were going to tell him about the unusually bright star. we couldn't get anyone to answer the door that early in the morning. we then proceeded to go knock on another person's door that he knew that was directly across from the other apartment we were just at. at this point a few hours had passed. as he was opening up the metal screen door to his other friends apartment i was behind him. something caught my attention and we then both turned around looking up and witnessed a large object coming out of the sky. we both were in amazement. we walked out away from the apartment and slightly towards whatever was coming out of the sky. then all i can remember is that there was this blackish grey triangular craft gliding over the top of us. time seemed to slow down at this point. as it was going over us i got a good look at it. it had one small red light directly in the middle of the craft. it had three slightly larger white lights on each corner of the craft. i also noticed that there was multicolored lights moving in between the white lights. like in a pulsating pattern. i remember as the craft was floating over us we both were saying, "wow" in total amazement and astonishment. i remember feeling that there was this low humming vibration going through my body and concentrating in my chest.(later on my friend confirms this as well)there was a really low sound but this may have been this low humming sound/vibration. as it floated over us i remember watching it float/glide away from us and again it seemed like an eternity as we both watched it float away. i remember feeling sad that it was going away. we then watched it float up and over these nearby houses. it was moving very slow. in my mind i was thinking that it almost looked unreal at how it was floating and moving up and over the houses.
we then frantically went back to his car(chevell) and got in. we just sat there with our jaws open and not saying a word, except for "did you see that". as we were pondering in disbelief as to what just occurred we both started to feel as though we were telepathically communicating with each other. this was shocking and scary to us. we almost couldn't look at each other. he then said that he just saw some symbols on my forehead. which was really strange to me. and if the ufo encounter wasn't strange enough. we sat there in his car for a long time trying to take all of the experience in. we were both still in a state of shock. we both agreed that we wouldn't say anything to each other about what we just experienced and that we both would draw on a piece of paper what we saw when he dropped me off at my house. at this point i remember as we were sitting in his car that a trash truck was coming up to the apartments and began to take the trash. we both thought this was unusual and we were thinking why a trash truck would be working this early in the morning. so at this point the time had to have been in the early hours before the sun was to come up. he then proceeded to take me to my house and drop me off. there wasn't alot of talking between us as we were still trying to process what had happened to us. when we pulled up in the front of my house we both agreed to draw what we had witnessed. he got out a piece of small paper which i think it was a receipt and he ripped it in half. he gave me a pencil and we both began to draw what we had seen. we then looked at each other's drawing and it was an exact match. a triangle craft with one light in the middle and three on each corner.
we just sat there in disbelief. we said our good byes and i went into my house to go to bed since it was getting light out. 
so that's the main part of the ufo encounter me and my friend had. 
now on to the rest...
the next afternoon we contacted each other on the phone and as we were discussing the incident some very unusual memories began to emerge. for one we both remember seeing the highway and a bunch of red tail lights going north on the highway. there was a bunch of emergency vehicles going north on 55hwy. and the memory is up in the air somehow looking down and north towards the highway. also the tail lights seemed blurred or elongated. but was definitely a birds eye view of the highway going north. the strange thing is is that from where we were at at the time of the encounter there's no way physically possible to see the highway. this is very strange to me. 
another strange thing is that about a week later i was working as a janitor at a school mopping the floors when all of a sudden this thought of a blueprint of some sort came into my mind. i don't remember what it was or meant but i talked to my friend at the time about it and he said the same thing happened to him. so that's a mystery as to whether it was related to our encounter. and we weren't sure whether we was abducted but we may have been. that would account for seeing the tail lights go down the highway.

one final note i want to add is that my friend said that after he dropped me off he went into the 711 right up the road from the apartments and there was emergency personnel in the gas station talking about something. i'm assuming they got word of the incident from it being reported or saw the craft as well. 

i'm also willing to take a polygraph test if necessary.
content.summary: Me & a friend observed a unusually bright star. we then had a triangular craft fly right over us. it then proceeded to fly up and over the tree line. made no sound except for a low humming vibration that was felt in our bodies. there's more to the

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a strange pulsating glowing orb in the southwest sky out my bedroom window got my mom to verify the siding with me saw airplanes flying under it and around it as the color continued to pulse and change colors. there was no sound and a was not found on skyview light but all the other objects in the sky were clearly identified on the app. placed a call to the local news sent them an email of a 9 second video and a 50 second video the lady said she had received multiple calls about the object
content.summary: Bright pulsating twinkling light not found on sky view lite

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside with my wife for a cigarette at around 9:14 pm. i noticed a bright orange fire coloured ball approaching our direction. i told my wife, ( what the f*** is that, than it changed direction to the left and continued out of sight miles away, without descending what so ever.Around 10 min later we noticed military jets doing fly overs, searching for something, couldn't believe my eyes. seriously i believe this needs a look. 


p.S please investigate



regards


patrick kreller
content.summary: Bright orange fireball coming straight towards us, than changing direction to the left,military jets followed about 10 min later

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1999 friend and i were outside. about 2200-2300. it was getting late. he pointed me to the directiin of something behind me. in the sky. brilliant colors, some blinking, some pulsating, and the reflective object landed or hovered at ground level in a wooded area behind a cemetery in a strip of woods that were cleared to run powerlines. we watched it, amazed and confused and as it got to ground level, i immediately freaked out and started jumping up and down tapping him on the shoulder saying his name over and over and saying that is a ufo. we ran back to my house to tell my step dad, who was a shrewd businessman who didn't believe in anything he is not religious he doesn't believe in anything at all- i ran in the house and the dark dog started going crazy, and i said to come see outside, that there was a ufo. he was screaming at me and i kept telling him there was something outside. he was yelling at me in complete disbelief as he walked outside the side door to the house. he immediately stopped talking and watched as the object slowly ascended silently and began to move slowly away and he said get the keys to the truck. we got the keys and headed northbound on a highway here and we followed it through four cities with others until we can no longer keep up. there were four of us in the vehicle.
content.summary: Reflective oval landed or hovered close to ground, left ground and we followed it in a vehicle as far as we could
